short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring a touch of calm and mystery to your browsing experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This background captures the beauty of a bright, mystical full moon casting a soft glow over a modern cityscape, with buildings silhouetted against a rich blue night sky. Perfect for night owls and city lovers, this theme provides a peaceful yet captivating backdrop, with minimal light reflections to keep your focus on the content. Add a unique atmospheric vibe to your browser with this enchanting, moonlit urban scene.
